title: Role Group
detail: Roles with this group can view, create, update and delete roles.

permissions.title: View Role
permissions.detail: Permission to view roles list.

permissions.title: Create Role
permissions.detail: Permission to create a new role.

permissions.title: Update Role
permissions.detail: Permission to update a role.

permissions.title: Delete Role
permissions.detail: Permission to delete any role.

title: User Group
detail: Roles with this group can process all the functions related to users.

permissions.title: View User
permissions.detail: Permission to view users list and their details.

permissions.title: Create User
permissions.detail: Permission to create a new user.

permissions.title: Update User
permissions.detail: Permission to update a user detail.

permissions.title: Deactivate User
permissions.detail: Permission to deactivate any user's account.

permissions.title: Change User's Role
permissions.detail: Permission to change role of a user e.g. promote to Super Admin

title: Data Source Group
detail: Roles with this group can process all the functions related to data sources.

permissions.title: View Data Source
permissions.detail: Permission to view data source list and their details.

permissions.title: Add Data Source
permissions.detail: Permission to add a new data source.

permissions.title: Update Data Source
permissions.detail: Permission to update a data source.

permissions.title: Delete Data Source
permissions.detail: Permission to delete any data source.

permissions.title: Test Data Source Connection
permissions.detail: Permission to test if a data source is successfully connected.

title: Utility Group
detail: Roles with this group can view, create, update and delete user's Department and Position.

permissions.title: View Department
permissions.detail: Permission to view departments list.

permissions.title: Add Department
permissions.detail: Permission to add a new department.

permissions.title: Update Department
permissions.detail: Permission to update a department.

permissions.title: Delete Department
permissions.detail: Permission to delete any department.

permissions.title: View Designation
permissions.detail: Permission to view designations list.

permissions.title: Add Designation
permissions.detail: Permission to add a new designation.

permissions.title: Update Designation
permissions.detail: Permission to update a designation.

permissions.title: Delete Designation
permissions.detail: Permission to delete any designation.
